title: Introduction to XML and TEI
author: John Doe
description: An overview of XML and TEI, highlighting their significance in document markup.

title: Benefits of Using TEI in Digital Humanities
author: Jane Smith
description: Explore the advantages of employing TEI for encoding and preserving humanities data in the digital era.

title: XML Schema: Defining Document Structure
author: Alex Johnson
description: A brief guide to XML Schema and its role in defining the structure and constraints of XML documents.

title: TEI Guidelines for Text Encoding
author: Emily Rogers
description: An overview of TEI guidelines and best practices for encoding textual information in diverse contexts.

title: Transforming XML with XSLT
author: Michael Brown
description: Learn how XSLT (eXtensible Stylesheet Language Transformations) is used to transform XML data into different formats.
